meanings.definition: A small piece of meat or seafood grilled on a skewer.
meanings.sent1: At the barbecue, I enjoyed a tasty cabob of grilled shrimp.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served delicious chicken cabobs with vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The cabob of beef looked so tiny on the long stick!
meanings.sent4: She skewered the cabob of fish with precision, like a chef.
meanings.sent5: The sizzling cabob on the skewer made my mouth water.

meanings.definition: To grill meat or seafood on a skewer.
meanings.sent1: We will cabob the marinated chicken for the barbecue.
meanings.sent2: He loves to cabob shrimp and vegetables for dinner.
meanings.sent3: I cabobbed the meat carefully to ensure even cooking.
meanings.sent4: She cabobs the skewered seafood like a pro chef.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of cabobbing meat filled the backyard.
